source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT M.FileID,'dbo' SchemaName,M.FileName TableName,L.Date,L.TimePopulated,L.RowID FROM ExtractLog L INNER JOIN ExtractMaster M ON M.FileID=L.FileId WHERE   ISNULL(FlgPulled,0)=0 AND Date=CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AND M.FileID IN(20) ORDER BY FileID ASC

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM TEMP_ClosingStockDetail_Astic WHERE CAST(CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CREATEDDATE,120)) AS TIme(0)) BETWEEN CAST('@{item().TimePopulated}' AS TIME) AND CAST(DATEADD(mi,1,'@{item().TimePopulated}') AS TIME)

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT M.FileID,'dbo' SchemaName,M.FileName TableName,L.Date,L.TimePopulated,L.RowID FROM ExtractLog L INNER JOIN ExtractMaster M ON M.FileID=L.FileId WHERE   ISNULL(FlgPulled,0)=0 AND Date=CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AND M.FileID IN (1,2) ORDER BY FileID,L.TimePopulated ASC

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM DSRAbsentee_Data WHERE CAST(SchedulerCycleDateTime AS time(7))='@{item().TimePopulated}'
SELECT * FROM FailedVisitOutlet_Data WHERE CAST(SchedulerCycleDateTime AS time(7))='@{item().TimePopulated}'
